name: The Legend of Asie: A Mod Between Versions
name_original: The Legend of Asie: A Mod Between Versions
description:
the game makes heavy use of arrow keys but unfortunately it doesn't go NANONANONANONANO suddenly

this is a parody game about Asie (a.k.a. Asiekierka), a humble Pole who hath become the main maintainer and developer of a once very popular Minecraft mod called BuildCraft

this is based on a random idea that happened when I tweeted the above lore at Asie and he joked about Legend of Asie

the goal of the game is to avoid hashtags

I'm planning to add some kind of highscores and maybe user interface and in worst case multiplayer
